tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I underwent RCT procedure. The doctor completed the procedure very efficiently in under 30 minutes without any complications. Purely painless  procedure. what else to say except that I am totally satisfied with the doctor. Very satisfying experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Excellent work done by Dr shankar . I can say a perfectionist in work . He has completed root canal in jus 20 mins in one sitting and the surprising part is I have not at all come across a pinch of pain after the treatment .

Excellent job sir . Thank you so much . 

#Excellent #perfectionist #neat&clean # Highlyproffesional #happy to be treated in Nimi dental #Good job #Highly recommendable

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Friendliness painless treatment handling of the equipments overall good experience and value for the money and time too.. thank a lot to the whole team..

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I am satisfied by treatment and also patients handling friendly and smoothly.hospital all staff we are talking patients comfortable languages and treatment explain way is very nice

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I would like to Dr. Shankar for his determination, dedication towards the work. He was very friendly and explained the issue with my teeth problem. He was able identify by problem in couple of minutes and rectify it in 30 mins. Thank you Dr. Shankar.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Good reception by the receptionist and staff. Special thanks to Dr Geethasudarshan for her guidance and painless treatment.  Both Dr Shankar and Dr Geethasudarshan were friendly, soft spoken and dedicated service. Mimi hospital is clean and hygienic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Very hygienic and a modern set up,with very soothing ambience .Dr Shankar and  
Dr Sowmyashree are very friendly and patient , **** ** *** **** ************* *** highly experienced.Would definitely recommend this clinic for any teeth related issues.
